abstract: The Blocks Database contains multiple alignments of conserved regions in protein families. The database can be searched by e-mail and World Wide Web (WWW) servers ( http://blocks.fhcrc.org/help ) to classify protein and nucleotide sequences.
about: Physical and Biochemical Characterisation of DNA
DNA-Mediated Cell Transformation and Nucleic Acids Transfer
title: The Blocks Database—A System for Protein Classification
